para.programlisting: <xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:simple="http://zorba-xquery.com/test/vsimple.xsd" targetNamespace="http://zorba-xquery.com/test/vsimple.xsd" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="qualified"> <xs:element name="duration" type="xs:duration"/> <xs:element name="dd"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element ref="simple:duration"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:schema>
